description: Smooth Rock Ventures Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties. The company has a 100% undivided interest in 28 unpatented mining claims with a combined area of 226 hectares in the Chucker Project located in the Silver Star Mining District, within Mineral County, Nevada. It also has an option to purchase agreement to acquire a 100% undivided interest in Palmetto Project comprising of 79 unpatented mining claims totaling 1600 acres in Esmeralda County, Nevada. In addition, the company has an option to purchase agreement to acquire a Giroux Project consisting of 12 patented claims located in southeast of Hawthorne; and option to acquire Garfield Flats property located in Mineral County, Nevada. Smooth Rock Ventures Corp. was incorporated in 1966 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
